title: Xanadu 1/1 on 1st floor Ready Now!
posting_body: Hilton Head Apartment Homes offer everything you are looking for in apartment living.
Come discover our beautifully landscaped community for yourself!Community Amenities

2 Large Swimming Pools with Sun Decks • FREE Wi-Fi in Clubhouse and Pool Area • Fitness Center • Clubhouse • Business Center • Near Public Transportation • Community Park • Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills • Monthly Resident Activities • Courtyard • 2 Dog Parks • Beautiful Community Fountains • Apartment Alarm Systems • Reserved Parking Available
Online Payment Options • Package Receiving • Free Weights • High Speed Internet •
On-Site Management • On-Site Maintenance • Short Term Lease • Spanish Speaking Staff
Spacious 1 & 2 Bedroom Floor Plans • Private Patios/Balconies with Storage •
Large Walk-In Closets • Hardwood Style Flooring* • Ceiling Fans • Fully Equipped Kitchens •
Washer/Dryer Included • Vaulted Ceilings* • Air Conditioner •
Cable Ready • Accent Walls Available • Hardwood Floors • Carpeting • Extra Storage • Security Alarm • View
Our leasing teams are here and ready to assist you, online, via email, phone calls, virtual communication.
Appointments are strongly recommended for in person tours.
Social Distancing and/or face masks required.
Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350.00, Rent $20.00
Pets Welcome *One time pet fee and rent are per pet
Hilton Head is an animal friendly community and we know you and your animal will love living here.
Our animal fee is $350 (non-refundable for each animal).
Animal rent is $20 per animal, per month.
Please stop by the leasing office for more details.
If you have any further questions please don't hesitate to give us a call.
